message2: you can join the group chat for this event. Organizers will keep updating information in the chat. Please make sure you save the event link or download app so that you can access to chat again. We send this receipt to your email please check your in/spam/trash box.
message2_free: you can access the group chat for this event. Organizers will keep updating information in the chat. Please make sure you save the event link or download app so that you can access to chat again. We send your account information to your email please check your in/spam/trash box.
welcomeJoinChat2: You can download app for perfect chatting experience
downloadappToSendpic: Download Chumi so that you can send images and voice message.
message2_active: Now you can go back to Chumi, tap 'I've activated it.' to activate the features.
Custom registration form can include sin: Custom registration form can include single select, multiple select and text questions.
Question: Question
I accept the terms of service and have r: I accept the terms of service and have read the privacy policy. Chumi will not save any credit card information.

The name shown on your card: The name shown on your card

This is not my email. Click to update.
Send payout information to my email: Send payout information to my email
We use Stripe as our payment gateway, so: We use Stripe as our payment gateway, so you can have a real-time and secure payment service
If you are student groups, please set yo: If you are student groups, please set your account identity as an individual, update address with your school location and update your business as student events.
If you do not have enough information th: If you do not have enough information that Stripe requests, we can help you collect payment and transfer later.
Be aware that collecting payment for you: Be aware that collecting payment for you will take more fee than regular ones.
Setting up payout is free, if you have c: Setting up payout is free, if you have concerns, please contact us, we will respond as soon as possible.
Takes only 5 mins to create an event, yo: Takes only 5 mins to create an event, you can create a custom register form or invite influencers to sell tickets etc.
If you need to sell tickets please setup: If you need to sell tickets please setup your bank information for payout.
Search events you want to attendee: Search events you want to attendee
If you do not see the events, you can in: If you do not see the events, you can invite organizer to use Chumi next time
Group Purchase : You will pay original p: Group Purchase : You will pay original price and get cash back once another person join you.
We send this receipt to your email pleas: We send this receipt to your email please check your in/spam/trash box. If you do not receive it, please contact us at
And access group chat for this events: And access group chat for this events
This event is offering physical tickets: This event is offering physical tickets only
You cannot directly buy tickets online.
Here is how you buy tickets: Here is how you buy tickets
You can buy from event sub-promoters, pa: You can buy from event sub-promoters, pay them cash and they will send you the confirmation for exchanging tickets later.
Become a sub-promoter for this event, bu: Become a sub-promoter for this event, buy/sell tickets and earn commission
Use the invite code to self-invite to be: Use the invite code to self-invite to be a sub-promoter on Chumi App
Buy tickets, you will earn credit for ne: Buy tickets, you will earn credit for next event
Please use Wechat App to scan following: Please use Wechat App to scan following QR-code to pay. Please stay on this page until we redirect you to the confirmation page.
Please use make screenshot of QRcode and: Please use make a screenshot of QRcode and use Wechat App to pay. Once you pay, click form to proceed.
If you are individual, you can simply do: If you are individual, you can simply download Chumi app to track your sales.
If you are running a online media, you c: If you are running a online media, you can get a white label promotion site under your media name. Keep your brand, get more events, monetize your traffic. contact admin@chumi.co

You can click on following button to try: You can click on following button to try again, if it is not working, please contact us for help. You will not be charged twice.
